statements: UPDATE monitoring_tools SET tool_name = 'New Tool' WHERE tool_id = 1;
UPDATE monitoring_tools SET last_update = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, tool_description = 'Updated description' WHERE tool_id = 2;
UPDATE monitoring_tools SET tool_name = 'New Tool Name', tool_description = 'Updated Description' WHERE tool_id = 1;
UPDATE monitoring_tools SET last_update = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, tool_name = 'Tool A' WHERE tool_id = 2;
UPDATE security_vulnerabilities SET description = 'Updated description for vulnerability 1' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE monitoring_tools SET vendor_name = 'New Vendor Inc', license_key = 'abcd1234' WHERE tool_name = 'Tool 2';
UPDATE security_vulnerabilities SET description = 'Fixed security flaw in authentication module' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE monitoring_tools SET vendor_name = 'NewVendor', tool_name = 'NewTool' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE security_alerts SET alert_type = 'Critical' WHERE alert_id = 1;
UPDATE vulnerability_scans SET scan_status = 'Completed', scan_results = '{"status":"OK","vulnerabilities":3}' WHERE scan_id = 5;
UPDATE security_alerts SET alert_message = 'New alert message', alert_type = 'Critical' WHERE alert_id = 1;

UPDATE vulnerability_scans SET scan_status = 'Completed', scan_results = '{"vulnerabilities": [{"name": "XSS", "severity": "High"}, {"name": "SQL Injection", "severity": "Medium"}]' WHERE scan_id = 3;
UPDATE tools SET version = 2.0 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE monitoring SET status = 'Active', last_check = '2023-05-10 14:30:00' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE tools SET description = 'New description', version = 2.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE vulnerabilities SET alert_status = TRUE, severity = 'High' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE tools SET tool_description='Updated description' WHERE tool_id=1;
UPDATE monitoring SET monitoring_interval=30 WHERE monitoring_id=3;
UPDATE tools SET tool_description = 'New tool description' WHERE tool_id = 1;
UPDATE monitoring SET monitoring_interval = 30, monitoring_tool = 'Updated tool' WHERE monitoring_id = 2;
